headline.main: Teaching With Infographics | Science and Health

docs.abstract: Charts, graphs, interactive maps and other visualizations that can help students understand key issues and topics in health and science.
docs.lead_paragraph: September 1, 2010 | Updated On Monday we kicked off "infographics week" on the blog. Yesterday we ran down some of the best infographics on NYTimes.com for teaching social studies, current events, politics, history and economics. Tomorrow we'll provide a list for language arts and fine arts.
docs.snippet: Charts, graphs, interactive maps and other visualizations that can help students understand key issues and topics in health and science.
